turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like you to order me a drink from Starbucks please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I can do that, which location should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 70th St. in Lincoln please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what can I get ordered for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like an iced cold foam cappuccino with regular milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm pretty tired this afternoon, get me the largest they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will order you the Venti.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please add one shot of espresso to the drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so you would like a venti iced cold foam cappuccino, regular milk, with one extra shot of espresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I will put that order in at the 70th St. location in Lincoln.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Before I submit the order, are you sure there is nothing else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I am sure, just the one coffee will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright I have submitted the order for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. The order will be ready in a few minutes and your receipt should be arriving on your mobile phone any minute.
